FOLDER.NAME: EDWTD_REV_MEASURE
FOLDER.DESCRIPTION: This folder will have all the informatica objects related GL and INV REVENUE MEASURE table load process for rel3.0 Approvers:Kathy Kwong, Murali Marni, Geetha Bhakta

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
SELECT TEMP.REVENUE_MEASURE_KEY, TEMP.SALES_ORDER_KEY, TEMP.SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY, TEMP.PRODUCT_KEY, TEMP.AR_TRX_KEY, TEMP.AR_TRX_LINE_KEY, TEMP.BK_AR_TRX_LINE_GL_DISTRIB_KEY, Coalesce(POS_TRANS.BK_END_USER_WIPS_SITE_USE_KEY,Cast(-999 As Integer)) AS END_CUSTOMER_KEY, /*GCSP Q2FY19 */ POS_TRANS.BK_BILL_TO_WIPS_SITE_USE_KEY AS BILL_TO_CUSTOMER_KEY, POS_TRANS.BK_SHIP_TO_WIPS_SITE_USE_KEY AS SHIP_TO_CUSTOMER_KEY, POS_TRANS.BK_SOLD_TO_WIPS_SITE_USE_KEY AS SOLD_TO_CUSTOMER_KEY, /*GCSP Q2FY19 */ TEMP.SALES_TERRITORY_KEY, TEMP.DIRECT_CORP_ADJUSTMENT_KEY, TEMP.GENERAL_LEDGER_ACCOUNT_KEY, TEMP.SALES_REP_NUMBER, TEMP.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT, TEMP.BK_SALES_ADJ_LINE_NUMBER_INT, TEMP.BK_SALES_ADJ_NUMBER_INT, TEMP.DV_FISCAL_YEAR_MTH_NUMBER_INT, TEMP.DD_BK_FINANCIAL_ACCOUNT_CD, TEMP.DD_GL_DATETIME, TEMP.DD_BK_TRXL_CURRENCY_CD, TEMP.BK_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, TEMP.DV_FISCAL_DT, TEMP.DD_FUNCTIONAL_CURRENCY_CD, TEMP.DD_BK_AR_TRX_TYPE_CD, TEMP.DD_BK_DIRECT_CORP_ADJ_TYPE_CD, TEMP.DD_SERVICE_TYPE_CD, TEMP.BK_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_CODE, TEMP.AR_TRX_DATETIME, TEMP.REV_MEASURE_TRANS_TYPE_CD, TEMP.DV_FORWARD_REVERSE_CD, TEMP.DV_CORPORATE_REVENUE_FLG, TEMP.DV_IC_REVENUE_FLG, TEMP.DV_CHARGES_FLG, TEMP.DV_MISC_FLG, TEMP.DV_SERVICE_FLG, TEMP.DV_INTERNATIONAL_DEMO_FLG, TEMP.DV_REPLACEMENT_DEMO_FLG, TEMP.DV_REVENUE_FLG, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_NET_PRICE_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_NET_LIST_PRICE_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_GROSS_LIST_PRICE_AM, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_NET_COST_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_GROSS_REV_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_NET_REV_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_2TIER_CMDM_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_GROSS_COST_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_STANDARD_PRICE_AMT, TEMP.DD_EXTENDED_NET_QTY, TEMP.DD_EXTENDED_GROSS_QTY, TEMP.EDW_CREATE_USER, TEMP.EDW_CREATE_DATETIME, TEMP.EDW_UPDATE_USER, TEMP.EDW_UPDATE_DATETIME, /* ADDED THE BELOW COLUMNS AS PART OF Q1FY15 OFFER ATTRIBUTION */ TEMP.DV_ATTRIBUTION_CD, TEMP.DV_PRODUCT_KEY, TEMP.DV_SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY, TEMP.SK_OFFER_ATTRIBUTION_ID_INT, /*ADDED BELOW LOGIC AS PART OF DSV Q1FY16 BY */ COALESCE(POS_TRANS.BK_BOOKING_POS_TRX_ID_INT, -9999) AS BK_BOOKING_POS_TRX_ID_INT, TEMP.DSV_FLG /*ADDED LOGIC AS PART OF DSV Q1FY16 BY */ ,TEMP.POB_TYPE_CD ,TEMP.SK_RTR_ATTRIBUTION_ID ,TEMP.SALES_MOTION_CD ,TEMP.DV_TRANSACTION_KEY FROM (SELECT NDSPAD.ALLOCATED_POS_ADJ_KEY AS REVENUE_MEASURE_KEY, Cast(-9999 As Integer) AS SALES_ORDER_KEY, Cast(-9999 As Integer) AS SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY, NDSPAD.PRODUCT_KEY, -9999 AR_TRX_KEY, -9999 AR_TRX_LINE_KEY, -9999 BK_AR_TRX_LINE_GL_DISTRIB_KEY, -999 BILL_TO_CUSTOMER_KEY, -999 SHIP_TO_CUSTOMER_KEY, -999 SOLD_TO_CUSTOMER_KEY, NDSPAD.SALES_TERRITORY_KEY AS SALES_TERRITORY_KEY, -9996 DIRECT_CORP_ADJUSTMENT_KEY, -996 GENERAL_LEDGER_ACCOUNT_KEY, NDSPAD.BK_SALES_REP_NUMBER AS SALES_REP_NUMBER, NDSPAD.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT, Cast(-999 As Integer) AS BK_SALES_ADJ_LINE_NUMBER_INT, Cast(-999 As Integer) AS BK_SALES_ADJ_NUMBER_INT, NDSPAD.DV_FISCAL_YEAR_MTH_NUMBER_INT AS DV_FISCAL_YEAR_MTH_NUMBER_INT, 'UNKNO' DD_BK_FINANCIAL_ACCOUNT_CD, NDSPAD.SALES_ADJUSTMENT_DATETIME DD_GL_DATETIME, NULL DD_BK_TRXL_CURRENCY_CD, -999 BK_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, CAST(NDSPAD.SALES_ADJUSTMENT_DATETIME AS DATE) AS DV_FISCAL_DT, NULL DD_FUNCTIONAL_CURRENCY_CD, 'UNKNOWN' DD_BK_AR_TRX_TYPE_CD, 'POS ALLOCATION' DD_BK_DIRECT_CORP_ADJ_TYPE_CD, NULL DD_SERVICE_TYPE_CD, 'UNKNOWN' BK_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_CODE, NDSPAD.SALES_ADJUSTMENT_DATETIME AS AR_TRX_DATETIME, 'POS' REV_MEASURE_TRANS_TYPE_CD, 'UNKNOWN' DV_FORWARD_REVERSE_CD, 'Y' DV_CORPORATE_REVENUE_FLG, 'Y' DV_IC_REVENUE_FLG, 'N' DV_CHARGES_FLG, 'N' DV_MISC_FLG, NDSPAD.SERVICE_BOOKING_FLAG AS DV_SERVICE_FLG, 'N' DV_INTERNATIONAL_DEMO_FLG, 'N' DV_REPLACEMENT_DEMO_FLG, 'Y' DV_REVENUE_FLG, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_NET_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_NET_PRICE_AMT, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_LIST_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_NET_LIST_PRICE_AMT, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_LIST_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_GROSS_LIST_PRICE_AM, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_COST_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_NET_COST_AMT, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_NET_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_GROSS_REV_AMT, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_NET_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_NET_REV_AMT, Cast(0.000000 As Decimal(18,6)) AS DV_COMP_US_2TIER_CMDM_AMT, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_COST_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_GROSS_COST_AMT, Cast(0.000000 As Decimal(18,6)) AS DV_COMP_US_STANDARD_PRICE_AMT, NDSPAD.ADJUSTMENT_QTY DD_EXTENDED_NET_QTY, NDSPAD.ADJUSTMENT_QTY DD_EXTENDED_GROSS_QTY, USER AS EDW_CREATE_USER, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) AS EDW_CREATE_DATETIME, USER AS EDW_UPDATE_USER, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) AS EDW_UPDATE_DATETIME, /* UPDATED THE BELOW COLUMNS AS PART OF Q2FY15 OFFER ATTRIBUTION ,CASE WHEN CUST.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT IS NOT NULL THEN 'BUNDLE' ELSE 'STANDALONE' END AS DV_ATTRIBUTION_CD ,NDSPAD.PRODUCT_KEY AS DV_PRODUCT_KEY ,-9999 AS DV_SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY ,-9999 AS SK_OFFER_ATTRIBUTION_ID_INT */ NDSPAD.ATTRIBUTION_TYPE_CD AS DV_ATTRIBUTION_CD, NDSPAD.TOP_SKU_ATTRIBUTED_PRODUCT_KEY AS DV_PRODUCT_KEY , CAST(-9999 AS INTEGER) AS DV_SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY , NDSPAD.BK_OFFER_ATTRIBUTION_ID_INT AS SK_OFFER_ATTRIBUTION_ID_INT, CASE WHEN NDSPAD.DSV_OR_POS_TYPE_CD='DSV_POS' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END DSV_FLG ,NDSPAD.POB_TYPE_CD ,-999 AS SK_RTR_ATTRIBUTION_ID ,NDSPAD.SALES_MOTION_CD ,NDSPAD.ALLOCATED_POS_ADJ_KEY AS DV_TRANSACTION_KEY FROM $$SLSORDVWDB.N_DRVD_SCA_POS_ADJ_DETAILS_NG NDSPAD /* REMOVED THE BELOW JOIN CONDITION AS PART OF Q2FY15 OFFER ATTRIBUTION LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT FROM $$SLSORDVWDB.N_POS_TRX_LINE_OFFER_ATRBTN GROUP BY 1 ) CUST ON NDSPAD.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT=CUST.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT */
WHERE NDSPAD.ALLOCATED_POS_ADJ_KEY > ( SELECT LAST_EXTRACT_ID FROM $$ETLVWDB.DW_JOB_STREAMS WHERE JOB_STREAM_ID = 'wf_WI_INV_REV_MSR_POS_ALLOC_SMR' AND JOB_GROUP_ID = 'EDWTD_REV_MEASURE') /*ADDED BELOW LOGIC AS PART OF DSV Q1FY16 BY */ AND NDSPAD.DSV_OR_POS_TYPE_CD IN ('POS','DSV_POS') /*ADDED LOGIC AS PART OF DSV Q1FY16 BY */ ) TEMP LEFT OUTER JOIN $$SLSORDVWDB.N_POS_TRANSACTION_LINE POS_TRANS ON TEMP.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT = POS_TRANS.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT
/* rivijay : Below union all is added to Process POS transaction which get missed whenever bookings team does some fix */ UNION ALL SELECT TEMP.REVENUE_MEASURE_KEY, TEMP.SALES_ORDER_KEY, TEMP.SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY, TEMP.PRODUCT_KEY, TEMP.AR_TRX_KEY, TEMP.AR_TRX_LINE_KEY, TEMP.BK_AR_TRX_LINE_GL_DISTRIB_KEY, Coalesce(POS_TRANS.BK_END_USER_WIPS_SITE_USE_KEY,Cast(-999 As Integer)) AS END_CUSTOMER_KEY, /*GCSP Q2FY19 */ POS_TRANS.BK_BILL_TO_WIPS_SITE_USE_KEY AS BILL_TO_CUSTOMER_KEY, POS_TRANS.BK_SHIP_TO_WIPS_SITE_USE_KEY AS SHIP_TO_CUSTOMER_KEY, POS_TRANS.BK_SOLD_TO_WIPS_SITE_USE_KEY AS SOLD_TO_CUSTOMER_KEY, /*GCSP Q2FY19 */ TEMP.SALES_TERRITORY_KEY, TEMP.DIRECT_CORP_ADJUSTMENT_KEY, TEMP.GENERAL_LEDGER_ACCOUNT_KEY, TEMP.SALES_REP_NUMBER, TEMP.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT, TEMP.BK_SALES_ADJ_LINE_NUMBER_INT, TEMP.BK_SALES_ADJ_NUMBER_INT, TEMP.DV_FISCAL_YEAR_MTH_NUMBER_INT, TEMP.DD_BK_FINANCIAL_ACCOUNT_CD, TEMP.DD_GL_DATETIME, TEMP.DD_BK_TRXL_CURRENCY_CD, TEMP.BK_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, TEMP.DV_FISCAL_DT, TEMP.DD_FUNCTIONAL_CURRENCY_CD, TEMP.DD_BK_AR_TRX_TYPE_CD, TEMP.DD_BK_DIRECT_CORP_ADJ_TYPE_CD, TEMP.DD_SERVICE_TYPE_CD, TEMP.BK_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_CODE, TEMP.AR_TRX_DATETIME, TEMP.REV_MEASURE_TRANS_TYPE_CD, TEMP.DV_FORWARD_REVERSE_CD, TEMP.DV_CORPORATE_REVENUE_FLG, TEMP.DV_IC_REVENUE_FLG, TEMP.DV_CHARGES_FLG, TEMP.DV_MISC_FLG, TEMP.DV_SERVICE_FLG, TEMP.DV_INTERNATIONAL_DEMO_FLG, TEMP.DV_REPLACEMENT_DEMO_FLG, TEMP.DV_REVENUE_FLG, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_NET_PRICE_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_NET_LIST_PRICE_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_GROSS_LIST_PRICE_AM, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_NET_COST_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_GROSS_REV_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_NET_REV_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_2TIER_CMDM_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_GROSS_COST_AMT, TEMP.DV_COMP_US_STANDARD_PRICE_AMT, TEMP.DD_EXTENDED_NET_QTY, TEMP.DD_EXTENDED_GROSS_QTY, TEMP.EDW_CREATE_USER, TEMP.EDW_CREATE_DATETIME, TEMP.EDW_UPDATE_USER, TEMP.EDW_UPDATE_DATETIME, /* ADDED THE BELOW COLUMNS AS PART OF Q1FY15 OFFER ATTRIBUTION */ TEMP.DV_ATTRIBUTION_CD, TEMP.DV_PRODUCT_KEY, TEMP.DV_SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY, TEMP.SK_OFFER_ATTRIBUTION_ID_INT, /*ADDED BELOW LOGIC AS PART OF DSV Q1FY16 BY */ COALESCE(POS_TRANS.BK_BOOKING_POS_TRX_ID_INT, -9999) AS BK_BOOKING_POS_TRX_ID_INT, TEMP.DSV_FLG /*ADDED LOGIC AS PART OF DSV Q1FY16 BY */ ,TEMP.POB_TYPE_CD ,TEMP.SK_RTR_ATTRIBUTION_ID ,TEMP.SALES_MOTION_CD ,TEMP.DV_TRANSACTION_KEY FROM (SELECT NDSPAD.ALLOCATED_POS_ADJ_KEY AS REVENUE_MEASURE_KEY, Cast(-9999 As Integer) AS SALES_ORDER_KEY, Cast(-9999 As Integer) AS SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY, NDSPAD.PRODUCT_KEY, -9999 AR_TRX_KEY, -9999 AR_TRX_LINE_KEY, -9999 BK_AR_TRX_LINE_GL_DISTRIB_KEY, -999 BILL_TO_CUSTOMER_KEY, -999 SHIP_TO_CUSTOMER_KEY, -999 SOLD_TO_CUSTOMER_KEY, NDSPAD.SALES_TERRITORY_KEY AS SALES_TERRITORY_KEY, -9996 DIRECT_CORP_ADJUSTMENT_KEY, -996 GENERAL_LEDGER_ACCOUNT_KEY, NDSPAD.BK_SALES_REP_NUMBER AS SALES_REP_NUMBER, NDSPAD.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT, Cast(-999 As Integer) AS BK_SALES_ADJ_LINE_NUMBER_INT, Cast(-999 As Integer) AS BK_SALES_ADJ_NUMBER_INT, NDSPAD.DV_FISCAL_YEAR_MTH_NUMBER_INT AS DV_FISCAL_YEAR_MTH_NUMBER_INT, 'UNKNO' DD_BK_FINANCIAL_ACCOUNT_CD, NDSPAD.SALES_ADJUSTMENT_DATETIME DD_GL_DATETIME, NULL DD_BK_TRXL_CURRENCY_CD, -999 BK_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, CAST(NDSPAD.SALES_ADJUSTMENT_DATETIME AS DATE) AS DV_FISCAL_DT, NULL DD_FUNCTIONAL_CURRENCY_CD, 'UNKNOWN' DD_BK_AR_TRX_TYPE_CD, 'POS ALLOCATION' DD_BK_DIRECT_CORP_ADJ_TYPE_CD, NULL DD_SERVICE_TYPE_CD, 'UNKNOWN' BK_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_CODE, NDSPAD.SALES_ADJUSTMENT_DATETIME AS AR_TRX_DATETIME, 'POS' REV_MEASURE_TRANS_TYPE_CD, 'UNKNOWN' DV_FORWARD_REVERSE_CD, 'Y' DV_CORPORATE_REVENUE_FLG, 'Y' DV_IC_REVENUE_FLG, 'N' DV_CHARGES_FLG, 'N' DV_MISC_FLG, NDSPAD.SERVICE_BOOKING_FLAG AS DV_SERVICE_FLG, 'N' DV_INTERNATIONAL_DEMO_FLG, 'N' DV_REPLACEMENT_DEMO_FLG, 'Y' DV_REVENUE_FLG, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_NET_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_NET_PRICE_AMT, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_LIST_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_NET_LIST_PRICE_AMT, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_LIST_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_GROSS_LIST_PRICE_AM, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_COST_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_NET_COST_AMT, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_NET_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_GROSS_REV_AMT, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_NET_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_NET_REV_AMT, Cast(0.000000 As Decimal(18,6)) AS DV_COMP_US_2TIER_CMDM_AMT, NDSPAD.EXTENDED_COST_PRICE_USD_AMOUNT AS DV_COMP_US_GROSS_COST_AMT, Cast(0.000000 As Decimal(18,6)) AS DV_COMP_US_STANDARD_PRICE_AMT, NDSPAD.ADJUSTMENT_QTY DD_EXTENDED_NET_QTY, NDSPAD.ADJUSTMENT_QTY DD_EXTENDED_GROSS_QTY, USER AS EDW_CREATE_USER, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) AS EDW_CREATE_DATETIME, USER AS EDW_UPDATE_USER, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) AS EDW_UPDATE_DATETIME, /* UPDATED THE BELOW COLUMNS AS PART OF Q2FY15 OFFER ATTRIBUTION ,CASE WHEN CUST.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT IS NOT NULL THEN 'BUNDLE' ELSE 'STANDALONE' END AS DV_ATTRIBUTION_CD ,NDSPAD.PRODUCT_KEY AS DV_PRODUCT_KEY ,-9999 AS DV_SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY ,-9999 AS SK_OFFER_ATTRIBUTION_ID_INT */ NDSPAD.ATTRIBUTION_TYPE_CD AS DV_ATTRIBUTION_CD, NDSPAD.TOP_SKU_ATTRIBUTED_PRODUCT_KEY AS DV_PRODUCT_KEY , CAST(-9999 AS INTEGER) AS DV_SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY , NDSPAD.BK_OFFER_ATTRIBUTION_ID_INT AS SK_OFFER_ATTRIBUTION_ID_INT, CASE WHEN NDSPAD.DSV_OR_POS_TYPE_CD='DSV_POS' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END DSV_FLG ,NDSPAD.POB_TYPE_CD ,-999 AS SK_RTR_ATTRIBUTION_ID ,NDSPAD.SALES_MOTION_CD ,NDSPAD.ALLOCATED_POS_ADJ_KEY AS DV_TRANSACTION_KEY FROM $$SLSORDVWDB.N_DRVD_SCA_POS_ADJ_DETAILS_NG NDSPAD /* REMOVED THE BELOW JOIN CONDITION AS PART OF Q2FY15 OFFER ATTRIBUTION LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT FROM $$SLSORDVWDB.N_POS_TRX_LINE_OFFER_ATRBTN GROUP BY 1 ) CUST ON NDSPAD.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT=CUST.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT */
WHERE NDSPAD.ALLOCATED_POS_ADJ_KEY in ( /*rivijay : Created this table to put POS keys in case need to Process if bookings does fix */ select POS_ADJ_KEY from $$STGDB.REV_POS_ADJ_PRCS_KEY ) /*ADDED BELOW LOGIC AS PART OF DSV Q1FY16 BY */ AND NDSPAD.DSV_OR_POS_TYPE_CD IN ('POS','DSV_POS') /*ADDED LOGIC AS PART OF DSV Q1FY16 BY */ ) TEMP LEFT OUTER JOIN $$SLSORDVWDB.N_POS_TRANSACTION_LINE POS_TRANS ON TEMP.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT = POS_TRANS.BK_POS_TRANSACTION_ID_INT

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation
Save session log for these runs

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Status of the previous task that is not disabled
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $Start.PrevTaskStatus

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error code for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $Start.ErrorCode

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error message for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $Start.ErrorMsg

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Status of the previous task that is not disabled
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_WI_INV_REV_MSR_POS_ALLOC_SMR.PrevTaskStatus

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_WI_INV_REV_MSR_POS_ALLOC_SMR.ErrorCode

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error message for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_WI_INV_REV_MSR_POS_ALLOC_SMR.ErrorMsg
